definition: Heshan district of Yiyang city 益陽市|益阳市[Yi4 yang2 shi4], Hunan
awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Yiyang city includes Ziyang district and Heshan district.
sentences.chinese: 益陽市城區包括資陽區和赫山區。
